amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit funds to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more than 50 employees from a Federal department or agency at any single conference occurring outside the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to send or otherwise pay for the attendance of more than 50 employees from a Federal department or agency at any single conference occurring outside the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
